meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bill Murphy David Bradley Chris Giglio Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7245.

td.p: Bill Murphy, an emergency physician from Laguna Beach, California
David Bradley, an author from Atlanta, Georgia
Chris Giglio, a Naval officer from Virginia Beach, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,800)

tr.td: BIG-SCREEN ELVIS
IN THE STATE NICKNAME
GET A HANDLE ON IT
QUIZINE
LITERARY MILITARY
4-LETTER FRIENDS
